snippet: A Manhattan judge set Aug. 26 as the trial date for the fiery Islamic preacher known as Abu Hamza al-Masri, who was extradited from Britain over the weekend.
abstract: Abu Hamza al-Masri, Muslim cleric extradited to the United States from Britain to face terrorism charges, pleads not guilty; Federal District Court Judge Katherine B Forrest sets trial date of Aug 26, 2013.
lead_paragraph: A Manhattan judge set Aug. 26 as the trial date for the fiery Islamic preacher known as Abu Hamza al-Masri, who was extradited from Britain over the weekend.

headline.seo: Muslim Cleric, Abu Hamza al-Masri, Pleads Not Guilty to Terrorism Charges
headline.main: Muslim Cleric Pleads Not Guilty in Terror Case
headline.print_headline: Muslim Cleric Enters Plea Of Not Guilty In Terror Case
